title: GitLab CI/CD
description: GitLab CI/CD is a tool built into GitLab for software development through the continuous methodologies of Continuous Integration (CI), Continuous Delivery (CD), and Continuous Deployment (CD).

title: Docker
description: Docker is a platform that uses OS-level virtualization to deliver software in packages called containers, ensuring it runs the same regardless of the environment.
content:
[Docker Getting Started Guide](https://docs.docker.com/get-started/)
[Docker and Kubernetes: The Complete Guide](https://www.udemy.com/course/docker-and-kubernetes-the-complete-guide/)

title: Linting in Python
description: Linting is the process of analyzing code for potential errors and stylistic issues. In Python, tools like Flake8 are popular for this purpose.
content:
[Flake8: Your Tool for Style Guide Enforcement](https://flake8.pycqa.org/en/latest/)
[Python Code Quality: Tools & Best Practices](https://realpython.com/tutorials/code-quality/)

title: Testing in Python with pytest
description: pytest is a popular framework in Python for writing and executing tests. It's known for its simplicity and scalability in writing simple to advanced test cases.

title: Cloud Deployment
description: Deploying applications in the cloud allows for scalability and accessibility. Major providers include AWS, Google Cloud, and Microsoft Azure.
content:
[Introduction to AWS for Developers](https://aws.amazon.com/getting-started/hands-on/)
[Google Cloud Platform Fundamentals](https://cloud.google.com/docs/tutorials)
[Microsoft Azure Documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/?product=featured)
